name: ImmediateForward
description: Plugin that listens for TMX messages and forwards them to the V2X Radio (i.e. the RSU).

configuration.description: The log level for this plugin
JSON data defining the message types, PSIDs, and channel number for messages forwarded to the V2X radio at destination 1.
JSON data defining the message types, PSIDs, and channel number for messages forwarded to the V2X radio at destination 2.
JSON data defining the message types, PSIDs, and channel number for messages forwarded to the V2X radio at destination 3.
JSON data defining the message types, PSIDs, and channel number for messages forwarded to the V2X radio at destination 4.
The destination UDP server(s) and port number(s) on the V2X radio for all messages specified by Messages_Destination_1.
The destination UDP server(s) and port number(s) on the V2X radio for all messages specified by Messages_Destination_2.
The destination UDP server(s) and port number(s) on the V2X radio for all messages specified by Messages_Destination_3.
The destination UDP server(s) and port number(s) on the V2X radio for all messages specified by Messages_Destination_4.
0 if False and 1 if True indicating whether should sign outgoing J2735 messages.
REST API endpoint url needed to make HSM calls
If true (1) then do not send packets to the radio for broadcast
